bibl.title: Alexandria in Rome.
bibl.note: Paper given at the Loeb Classical Colloquium "Greece in Rome: Influence, Integration, Resistance" at Harvard University, October 6-7, 1994. - Features new elements as well as components from: Isis and Sarapis in the Roman World = Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 124 (Leiden, 1995).
bibl.seg: TAKÁCS Sarolta A., Alexandria in Rome.

Paper given at the Loeb Classical Colloquium "Greece in Rome: Influence, Integration, Resistance" at Harvard University, October 6-7, 1994. - Features new elements as well as components from: Isis and Sarapis in the Roman World = Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 124 (Leiden, 1995).
